favourite.article: Amen. Lord I open wide to You! Increase more of Yourself into me. Fill me with Thy Spirit now!
Lord, I just wanna be happy...
Lord, I need Thee, greatly need Thee! Empty me of anything hindering You. Fill me with Your Spirit now!
Fill me now! Fill me with Thy Spirit now!
Yes, Lord! Fill me with Your Holy Spirit! Cleanse me so that I am worthy to be called Your child. Fill me and guide me always.
Lord Jesus fill us with strength daily!

I really enjoyed this hymn.
'Strip me wholly, empty throughly, Fill me with Thy Spirit now'
When we are so full of everything in the world that there is no room inside us for the Lord. So we need to first be emptied so that we may give the Lord more room in us to be filled. Fill us with thy gracious Spirit, Lord!
Lord, dear Lord fill my spirit now with Your sweet and precious Spirit!! Hallelujah! I am weak and need Your Spirit now. Praise You dear Lord, come into my spirit now!!
Thank You, Lord! You have done so much for us! You are always there for us and filled us with your words and spirit!
Thank you Lord you are always filling us.
